name: Recompose
description:
Recompose hundreds of paintings and climb the rankings in Game Center!

Hundreds of paintings :

- AUTHOR'S PAINTINGS: Bosch, Botticelli, Brueghel, Canaletto, Caravaggio, Cezanne, Degas, Dürer, Gauguin, Giotto, Goya, Leonardo, Manet, Mantegna, Michelangelo, Monet, Perugino, Piero della Francesca, Raphael, Rembrandt, Renoir, Tiepolo, Tintoretto, Titian, Toulouse-Lautrec, Turner, Van Eyck, Van Gogh, Velazquez, and many others

- Paintings of Italian monuments
- Photos of various kinds (musical instruments, animals, etc!)

Rank Online Game Center

Have Fun
